channel.title: Finance on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Finance on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: What's at Stake in Marco Rubio, Wang Yi Meeting
item.description: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio will meet with his Chinese counterpart at a summit in Malaysia on Friday, the first in-person session between the two and a possible prelude to a presidential summit.

item.title: The China Show 7/11/2025
item.description: “Bloomberg: The China Show” is your definitive source for news and analysis on the world’s second-biggest economy. From politics and policy to tech and trends, Yvonne Man and David Ingles give global

item.title: The stock market now is clearly overbought — but overbought does not mean ‘sell’
item.description: Apple shares and big bank earnings are in focus as stocks hit another record.

item.title: Jorts and ‘quiet Western’ wear are helping Levi’s stave off the impact of tariffs
item.description: “With the 90s and Y2K fashion in full swing, longer and looser-style shorts are in high demand,” Levi’s CEO says.

item.title: Stock Futures Fall, Dollar Gains on Tariff Jitters: Markets Wrap
item.description: US equity-index futures retreated and the dollar strengthened after President Donald Trump ratcheted up trade tensions yet again by suggesting higher tariff rates on most trading partners.

item.title: ‘I’m in California and plan to stay here’: I’m 61, lost my job and live off my $425K IRA. My house has $650K in equity. Do I sell?
item.description: “A very stressful year-long job search yielded less than satisfactory results.”

item.title: Nvidia officially gets its $4 trillion finish. Here’s what could come next.
item.description: Analysts see paths to more milestones for Nvidia after the stock closed at a $4 trillion market capitalization for the first time Thursday.

item.title: Is Amazon’s Prime Day sale losing its appeal? Some early data suggest shoppers are spending less this year.
item.description: Amazon’s Prime Day event has grown to four days, but some signs point to a lack of consumer enthusiasm this year.

item.title: Bitcoin Options Traders Eye $120,000 as Token Extends Record Run
item.description: Bitcoin options traders are already setting their sights on higher prices as the original cryptocurrency extends its record-breaking rally for a second day.

item.title: Xi Signals China May Finally Tackle Deflationary Price Wars
item.description: After years of mounting concern over deflation and the bruising price wars that have plagued much of China’s economy, President Xi Jinping’s government is showing signs of finally taking action.
